subject: Re: [Read_Alphabet] QS-SAMPA Keyboard layout
msgSnippet: ... What exactly doesn t ThothSampa include? I worked late to do everything you said, so I m not exactly pleased to read this. Paul
messageBody:
Ted Larson Freeman wrote:
>
>
> Hi Moira,
>
> Some of your questions have to do with QS-SAMPA, and some have to do
> with the ThothSampa font, which does not yet include everything in the
> QS-SAMPA proposal and which contains remnants of the earlier layout.
> (For a font that does conform to QS-SAMPA, I suggest you try the font
> "Junior Sampa no. 1", contained in the file "JuniorQSSAMPA1.ttf" in
> the "Files->Fonts" folder for this group.)
>

What exactly doesn't ThothSampa include? I worked late to do everything
you said, so I'm not exactly pleased to read this.

Paul
